segments.text: Alright , tell me what you think .
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: Don't you think it ’ s a bit bright ?
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: Yeah , maybe you ’ re right . How about this outfit ?
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: This dress looks lovely on you , but it ’ s not very practical , is it ?
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: No , I don't have any plans to go to a formal dance any time soon , but I love the way it looks . I just had to try it on ! What do you think about this ? It ’ s casual , yet sophisticated .
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: I like the jeans , but you need something to go with the top . It ’ s too plain on its own .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: How about this scarf , these earrings , AMD an anklet ?
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: That might be going overboard a bit . How about just that scarf with a bracelet ?
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: That ’ s a good idea . You have a lot of good fashion sense .
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: Thanks . You ’ d be ok on your own . There are loads of fashion victims out there , and you are not one of them . Have you tried it on yet ?
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: Yep . Here it is . What do you think ?
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: That looks great . Just one more thing---you need some high heels with those jeans . Do you want a pair with a plain pattern or ones with a leopard print on them ?
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: The leopard print sounds fabulous . Are they a name brand ?
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: No , they ’ re a Prada knock-off for 1/10 of the price of the real thing .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: That ’ s even better than the real thing .
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: If I were you , I ’ d buy that now while it ’ s on sale . If you spend $ 100 , you get a $ 50 voucher for more clothes .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: It ’ s too bad I did all that shopping yesterday !
segments.speaker: S1
